name: Spaceline Pilot
description:
Become the most (in)famous Spaceline Pilot! Upgrade your ship, fight your way through the galaxy full of invaders, and transport your passengers safely to the next planet!
- Challenging space shooter
- No ads & IAP
- 14 levels (+4 of them with a twist)
- 4 bosses
- 10 achievements

How to play
- WASD / Arrow keys to control the ship. Attacking is automatic.
- try to lose as little cargos as possible - each delivered cargo gives you more coins which you can use to upgrade your ship
- collect power-ups to help you through the level
- you can get more coins from the contract on previous planets if you deliver more cargos then before

This galaxy shooter is a bit hard. Do not give up! If you struggle with some level, you can go back to any unfinished contracts to earn more coins for upgrades. But at least you can be sure it is not because we are trying to lure money for IAP out of your pocket. :-)
